question: Which city is host to World's First Global Refugee Forum?
explanation: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) is a United Nations (UN) agency, with an aim to assist and protect refugees. The first ever Global Refugee Forum is being conducted by the UNHCR on 17 and 18 December 2019 in Geneva, Switzerland. The Ministerial level event will be co-hosted by UNHCR and Switzerland . It is co-convened by the country heads of Turkey, Ethiopia, Germany and Costa Rica. Pakistanâ€™s Prime Minister Imran Khan also co-convenes the forum.
